divs: sighting detailsseen grays many encounters.gray came into my bedroom very large black eyes the didnt blink but kinda flickerd,many disc in snowflake az where i lived,onece saw a large flash that stayed in sky several minutes\i watched disc in arizona play in the sky for several hours zipping to and fro. grays eyes are not slanted almost octogon shaped\\ i seemd to startle it as much as it did me\\ i got no verbal or mental contact\\the eyes were so black i saw no light reflecting in them\\out fishing at night several of us were in a cabin we observed a very bright light that penetrated the cabin we were in. no one wanted to go outside to see what was out ther \\the morning arrived i was sitting on the other side of the cabin from where i was sitting\ i do not remember going to sleep or could figure out how i had gotten over the the place i was sitting when we were playing cards.none of my friend remember the incident at the river\\also my dad saw a disc with many round colored windows omitting a very bright light back in the early 60s of jbird road near huey town ala\\the other events i was alone\\\also the gray had on a suit like tinfoil with strange symbols on collal collar like what a priest wears
